data.quote: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.
data.Author: Richard Evans

data.quote: I believe that every person is born with talent.
data.Author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: The years teach much which the days never know.
data.Author: Ralph Emerson

data.quote: All know the way; few actually walk it.
data.Author: Bodhidharma

data.quote: Great talent finds happiness in execution.
data.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

data.quote: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course.
data.Author: Michelangelo

data.quote: Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
data.Author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
data.Author: Leo Tolstoy

data.quote: Anticipate the difficult by managing the easy.
data.Author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
data.Author: Buddha

data.quote: A short saying often contains much wisdom.
data.Author: Sophocles

data.quote: The day is already blessed, find peace within it.
data.Author: Anonymous

data.quote: It takes both sunshine and rain to make a rainbow.
data.Author: Anonymous
